TopicTitle: Posting A video on the Thread

Articles.Content:
I am starting to make videos to present my crafts and don't know the code or the process to do this, can someone explain how to embed a video on the Forums?

Edited September 27, 2015 by castille7
Question Answered
Just click the "Insert Video" button and paste the link, assuming you're using one of the supported video platforms (listed in the dialog when you click the button).

Just click the "Insert Video" button and paste the link, assuming you're using one of the supported video platforms (listed in the dialog when you click the button).

I've pasted the video link provided by Youtube and also the embed link and it's not working, do you have an example of what the link would look like?
